attributes.action: The people demand a general election by the end of September 2019!
attributes.additional_details: This is a crucial time in history of the United Kingdom and it should be down to the people which direction the country goes in and not the small minority of MPs at the top.
attributes.background:
The people of the United Kindom demand a general election by the end of September 2019. 
The MPs have no right to make a decision on our behalf and manipulate the people’s vote. We want a general election to decide who should be running our country now.
